duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain labor work measurement standards and implement best practices in industrial engineering within the assigned region.
Lead and support regional operations projects in warehouse automation, facility layout, and transportation, ensuring cost-effective solutions are recommended.
Train warehouse and delivery staff in efficient and safe work methods, and perform process simulations before deploying new labor standards.
Act as a mentor and adviser to divisional personnel, and consistently monitor and analyze warehouse and delivery operations to measure productivity metrics.
Maintain high-level relations with vendors throughout the implementation process and on an ongoing basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Industrial Engineering preferred)
